testcase.name: AskOmDch Place Order As a Guest - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the homepage...............................................passed Then user should be able to click store link................................passed And user to see "Dark Brown Jeans" product item..............passed And confirm "Dark Brown Jeans" product item and add to cart.................passed Then user should be able to see "Dark Brown Jeans” has been added to your cart." verify message.passed And user should be able to click shopping cart link.........................passed And user should be able to verify cart page and product added "Dark Brown Jeans".passed Then user should be able to click proceed to checkout button................passed And user should be able to see checkout page................................passed And user enters "Maximilian" for firstname..................................passed And user enters "Darden" for lastname.......................................passed And user enters "MaxDardenINC" for company name.............................passed And user selects "United States (US)" for country...........................passed And user enters "123 N Palatine rd" for street address first................passed And user enters "apt#321" for street address second.........................passed And user enters "Chicago" for city..........................................passed And user selects "IL" for state.............................................passed And user enters "60008" for zipcode.........................................passed And user enters "12345678" for phone........................................passed And user enters "MaxDar1@gmail.com" for email...............................passed And user clicks on payment method randomly..................................passed Then user should be able to click place order button........................passed And user should be able to see confirmation message for payment method in order confirmation.passed And user should be able to see "Thank you. Your order has been received." confirmation message.passed
